textAfterTable: Categories Comments Campus Safety Mercy college is in a safe environment. As well as most schools, there are I.D card requirements to get into the students' dorm building. There are security guards on the premises 24 hours. Clubs and Activities There are many clubs and activities. You can never get bored. There are teams from women's softball to men's basketball. Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus The school colors are navy blue and white. There is a program called the PACT program. It is where a student has a mentor who helps them academic wise. Bang for the buck Mercy college is the cheapest private school in New York. Private schools are really expensive so this school is not bad at all. What to do for fun There are many teams for both male and female. There are also different activities.
